list-view-config.query-select:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX gesah: <http://ontology.tib.eu/gesah/> PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/> PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/170309/>
SELECT ?provenanceObj ?provenanceLabel ?placeObj ?placeLabel ?litteralDtAppel ?dateTimeStart ?dateTimeEnd ?person ?personName (group_concat(DISTINCT ?roleTypeLabel ; separator=", ") AS ?roleTypeLabels) (group_concat(DISTINCT ?description ; separator=", ") AS ?descriptions)
WHERE { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance .
OPTIONAL { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj vitro:mostSpecificType ?subclass . ?subclass rdfs:label ?provenanceLabel . } OPTIONAL { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj gesah:has_place ?placeObj . ?placeObj rdfs:label ?placeLabel . } OPTIONAL { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj gesah:literal_date_appellation ?litteralDtAppel . } OPTIONAL { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . ?dateTimeInterval core:start ?dateTimeStartValue . ?dateTimeStartValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeStart . } OPTIONAL { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . ?dateTimeInterval core:end ?dateTimeEndValue . ?dateTimeEndValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeEnd . } OPTIONAL { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj gesah:description ?description . } OPTIONAL { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj gesah:realizes ?roleObj . ?roleObj a obo:BFO_0000023 . ?roleObj gesah:has_role_type ?roleTypeObj . ?roleTypeObj a gesah:Role_Type . ?roleTypeObj rdfs:label ?roleTypeLabel . } OPTIONAL { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj gesah:realizes ?roleObj . ?roleObj a obo:BFO_0000023 . ?roleObj gesah:is_role_of ?person . ?person rdfs:label ?personName . } } GROUP BY ?provenanceObj ?provenanceLabel ?placeObj ?placeLabel ?litteralDtAppel ?dateTimeStart ?dateTimeEnd ?person ?personName ORDER BY ?provenanceObj
list-view-config.query-construct:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX gesah: <http://ontology.tib.eu/gesah/> PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/> PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/170309/>
CONSTRUCT { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj vitro:mostSpecificType ?subclass . ?provenanceObj gesah:has_place ?placeObj . ?provenanceObj gesah:literal_date_appellation ?litteralDtAppel . ?provenanceObj core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . ?provenanceObj gesah:description ?description . ?provenanceObj gesah:realizes ?roleObj . ?subclass rdfs:label ?provenanceLabel . ?placeObj rdfs:label ?placeLabel . ?dateTimeInterval core:start ?dateTimeStartValue . ?dateTimeInterval core:end ?dateTimeEndValue . ?dateTimeStartValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeStart . ?dateTimeEndValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeEnd . ?roleObj a obo:BFO_0000023 . ?roleObj gesah:has_role_type ?roleTypeObj . ?roleObj gesah:is_role_of ?person . ?roleTypeObj a gesah:Role_Type . ?roleTypeObj rdfs:label ?roleTypeLabel . ?person rdfs:label ?personName . } WHERE { { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj vitro:mostSpecificType ?subclass . ?subclass rdfs:label ?provenanceLabel . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj gesah:has_place ?placeObj . ?placeObj rdfs:label ?placeLabel . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj gesah:literal_date_appellation ?litteralDtAppel . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . ?dateTimeInterval core:start ?dateTimeStartValue . ?dateTimeStartValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeStart . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . ?dateTimeInterval core:end ?dateTimeEndValue . ?dateTimeEndValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeEnd . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj gesah:description ?description . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj gesah:realizes ?roleObj . ?roleObj a obo:BFO_0000023 . ?roleObj gesah:has_role_type ?roleTypeObj . ?roleTypeObj a gesah:Role_Type . ?roleTypeObj rdfs:label ?roleTypeLabel . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?provenanceObj . ?provenanceObj a gesah:Provenance . ?provenanceObj gesah:realizes ?roleObj . ?roleObj a obo:BFO_0000023 . ?roleObj gesah:is_role_of ?person . ?person rdfs:label ?personName . } }
